DOC.brief_summary: In this prospective observational study, the investigators tried assess the presence of biofilm on chronic wound samples coming from a large cohort study of patients, whilst cross-referencing the clinical, bacteriological and wound care observations.
DOC.brief_title: Characterisation of Biofilm of the Chronic Wounds
DOC.criteria: Patients with chronic wounds (period > 6 weeks) > 10 cm2 Patient age >18 for the 3 French centres Patient participation in a followup program for treatment of their wound > 1 month Availability of patient information and written informed consent from them or their legal representative Patients unable to submit to medical followup in the trial due to geographical constraints etc Patients deprived of freedom or under guardianship
